[File: aptos-core/third_party/move/move-core/types/src/effects.rs] [Validation] [Empty Operation] Can an Op contain empty/zero-length data in New or Modify variants? Should this be rejected as invalid? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/third_party/move/move-core/types/src/effects.rs] [Security] [Privilege Escalation] Can Changes from unprivileged transactions be crafted to modify system resources (e.g., validator set, governance), bypassing access controls? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/third_party/move/move-core/types/src/effects.rs] [Security] [Reentrancy] If applying Changes triggers callbacks or events, can reentrancy attacks modify Changes while they're being applied? (High)

[File: aptos-core/third_party/move/move-core/types/src/effects.rs] [Security] [Time-of-Check-Time-of-Use] Between checking if a resource exists and applying an operation, can the state change, causing TOCTOU vulnerabilities? (High)

[File: aptos-core/third_party/move/move-core/types/src/effects.rs] [Security] [Signature Bypass] Are Changes objects authenticated (e.g., signed by transaction sender)? Can malicious Changes be injected into the system? (Critical)
